duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and construct interfaces between ERP and legacy systems using back-end programming languages and front-end scripting languages.
Code programming logic for new or existing solutions software or applications in accordance with design specifications.
Handle installation, configuration, development, workflow design, monitoring, and/or upgrade of assigned software products.
Monitor quality and performance of applications through testing and maintenance.
Maintain up-to-date records of issues with existing code and suggest viable solutions to resolve them.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in computer science, software engineering, or a related field (Preferred Master’s degree)
